structure.unit: OCCUPATIONAL SAFETY AND HEALTH OF EMPLOYEES

law.history: Repealed 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 251, sec. 22. -- Amended 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 55, sec. 3. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 1599c-25, 2062f-6, 2741k-1, 2741k-2, 2741k-3, 4866b-7.

metadata.lrc-note: .This section was repealed by Acts 1972, ch. 251, รยง 22 and amended by Acts 1972, ch. 326. Since all statutes for which this section provided penalties were also repealed by Acts 1972, ch. 251, only the repealer has been given effect in this compilation.
